sentence: Lovely pool facilities and lazy river not so lazy though
Spent the day relaxing by their pools and lazy river while sipping a few cocktails
Myself wife and four kids had an awesome time at the resort especially Lazy river pool and golf
This resort has 4 pools 3 of them specifically centered around family fun
The pool facilities are amazing
Very nice property if a fancy pool is a high priority on your list this hotel should be considered
The staff were all pleasant and helpful and the food and drinks at the pool restaurant was great
My kids loved the lazy river and the pools
Love the lazy river and wave pool
Best Pool and Family Hotel
We were lucky enough to have the pool to ourselves for two mornings
The lazy river and wave pool were a hit with our daughter
I believe the pool closes at 10pm1pm so you have time to enjoy it for sure
Since I swam every morning in the adult pool before 8 when the family pool opened I got to witness the crew line up at the family pool hut for towels every morning
The pool needs to be resurfaced badly
And I did n’t like being in the pool area and waiting 45 minutes for kids to eat at Crocs

I did n’t have chance to use the swimming pools as I was there on business but I noticed they were huge and there was a good choice of quiet and serene pools some with wave machines and others with water jets and slides
Hopefully they do n’t actually charge anybody but I just did n’t like having that fee hanging over me every time I dropped off my shirt sandals and towel on a chair to get in the pool
The big pumps have not run to the knowledge of any employees so it is just a big funny shaped pool now
Now with the waves pool the place became a park not a premium private resort as it used to be
There is a kids club that does various activities throughout the day and they play a movie at night in the wave pool
Activities at night we watched the fireworks while sitting in the pool

Horrible experience there was a snake by the pool which was pretty scary and 3 days after I checked out I got charged 150 dollars out of the blue for no reason and they will not answer the phone or return my calls as of why this charge was made
Had a pool fountain fire pit hot spa and lazy river
